author: sauliusgrigaitis
content: I heard that at least some liquid staking protocols are not going to consolidate fast because their entire infra (rewards calculation etc.) is optimised for 32 ETH stakes. It may take years for them to update the infra and eventually consolidate. More centralized entities should not have this problem.
